name: Drive Drive DRIVE!
description:
Hi guys! I'm a single developer. this is my first game I'm publishing hope you guys like it...No hope you guys Love it. And please tell me how I can improve and what you would like to see  in the future, in the comments.  You don't know happy you are making me by playing.

  • So you have to keep in mind that your Fuel tank will be full at 30.
  • There are traffic cones and signs.
  • If you see fire coming out of the car that means you are low on fuel. 
  • Don't go off-road (You will loose control). 

  And tell me your best time in the comments hope you enjoy.

if you see any bugs or anything like that sorry about that and I will try to fix it in the future.
